<PannableContainer
  width={300}
  height={300}>
  <SpinnerImage
    style={{display:"block", width:500, height:500, maxWidth:"inherit"}}

<ZoomableImage
 enableZoomControls={true}
 enableReset={true}
 viewportWidth={600}
 viewportHeight={600}
 maxWidth={2000}
 maxHeight={2000}
 initialWidth={600}
 initialHeight={600}
 zoomRatio={1000}
 src="http://i5.walmartimages.com/dfw/dce07b8c-3b27/k2-_afa12da1-f17a-4ace-a8ae-8820733e5e0d.v1.jpg"
 />
